title: Rachael
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject talking Rachael>>
<<if visited ("Rachael") is false>>
Rachael: Hello detective. Can I help you?
->Sorry to interupt but I have some questions for you.
    Rachael: That's alright.
->Yes, I have some questions for you.
    Rachael: Well make it quick, I'm a busy woman.
Rachael: What is this about?
->Last night Jacob Wright was killed. I'm investigating.
    Rachael: *sigh* I knew he'd get himself in trouble eventually.
->I'm investigating a murder last night.
    Rachael: You mean Jacob, don't you?
    ->Yes.
        Rachael: *sigh* I knew he'd get himself into trouble over this.
    ->No
        Rachael: Oh good. What can I do to help?
    ->I can't comment on an ongoing investigation. Sorry.
        Rachael: That answers my question. 
    ->What makes you ask that?
        Rachael: It's obvious isn't it? After the announcement someone was bound to be angry.
<<else>>
Rachael: Yes?
<<endif>>
[[What were your movements last night?|Rachael.LastNight]]
[[What can you tell me about Jacob's announcement?|Rachael.Jacob]]
[[Just a moment, let me consult my notes|Rachael.Exit]]

title: Rachael.LastNight
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject talking2 Rachael>>

Rachael: Let's see. I finished work here at 5:00. Ask my staff.
Rachael: From there, I went to my favourite bar for a drink.
<<set $barUnlocked to true>>
Rachael: I left there at around 8, and went home.
->Do you have anyone who can back that up?
    Rachael: My staff and the bartender at BARNAME.
    ->Thanks.
        Rachael: Anything else?
    ->Can anyone vouch for you at home?
        Rachael: I live on my own, so no.
->Thanks. I'll add that to my notes
Rachael: I'm not a suspect am I?
->Everyone is a suspect at this stage.
->I'm just following all the leads.
Rachael: I see.
[[What can you tell me about Jacob's announcement?|Rachael.Jacob]]
[[Just a moment, let me consult my notes|Rachael.Exit]]

title: Rachael.Jacob
body:
<<runAnimation AnimationObject talking Rachael>>
Rachael: Well, I suppose most people don't know what we do here.
->Give me details.
    Rachael: Our company produces microprocessors. Very high quality technology.
    Rachael: Currently we make a lot of components for the military.
    Rachael: Things like stabilizers on Tanks, or targeting systems for missiles.
->Just cliff-notes if you don't mind.
    Rachael: Okay then. Short of it is we make military hardware.

Rachael: Recently Jacob had a change of heart about our business.
Rachael: He decided that if we want to be an ethical company, we need to stop feeding war with our technology.
Rachael: Needless to say, this didn't go down especially well with the shareholders.

Rachael: I tried to talk him out of it, but he's stubborn. Convinced his way is the only way.

[[What were your movements last night?|Rachael.LastNight]]
[[Just a moment, let me consult my notes|Rachael.Exit]]

title: Rachael.Exit
body: Rachael: Okay. I'll just get back to my emails.

title: Rachael.Intro
body:
<<set $morgueCall to true>>
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
It's funny how quickly a receptionist changes their tune when you flash your badge.
They weren't going to let me in to start with, but a quick flash of a badge, and I'm waved straight through...
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
